remarks: The unital ring homomorphisms between unital rings (in a universe) are a subcategory of the category of non-unital rings.  (Contributed by AV, 12-Mar-2020.)
statement:
rhmsubcrngc.c $e |- C = ( RngCat ` U ) $.
rhmsubcrngc.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
rhmsubcrngc.b $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Ring i^i U ) ) $.
rhmsubcrngc.h $e |- ( ph -> H = ( RingHom |` ( B X. B ) ) ) $.
rhmsubcrngc $p |- ( ph -> H e. ( Subcat ` C ) ) $.
